src_original: tathaiva maṇḍalaṃ likhitvāṣṭottaraśatajaptaiḥ kalaśaiḥ pūrvavad abhiṣekaṃ kalpayet /
tataḥ sarvapāpagatāḥ sarvanārakādiduḥkhebhyaḥ śīghraṃ vimucyante /  te ca vimuktapāpamahātmānaḥ śuddhāvāsadeveṣūtpannāḥ /
satataṃ buddhadharmasaṃgītim prāpnuvanti /  avaivartikabhūmipratiṣṭhitāś ca krameṇa bodhiṃ sākṣāt kurvanti /
tatpratibimbaṃ vā nāma ca kuṃkumena likhitvā //  apāyatrayamahābhayāt sattvānāṃ mokṣaṇāya //  mantrī parahite rataḥ kṛpāyā abhiṣiñcet //
